title: Commemorating the 10th Anniversary of the Kiwanis Ice Arena on February 5, 2011
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION commemorating the 10th Anniversary of the Kiwanis
Ice Arena on February 5, 2011

WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to honor those organ-
izations which faithfully devote their purposeful energies to  fostering
opportunities  for  and  to  contributing to the quality of life for the
youth of the communities they serve; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to commemorate the 10th
Anniversary of the Kiwanis Ice Arena to be celebrated  at  its  10  Year
Anniversary  at the Kiwanis Ice Arena in Saugerties, New York, on Satur-
day, February 5, 2011; and
  WHEREAS, To honor this auspicious event, the celebration will  include
festivities   throughout  the  day,  such  as  games,  raffles,  prizes,
balloons, and a bouncy bounce for the children; skate sessions will also
be open to the public; this wonderful celebration will conclude  with  a
spectacular fireworks display; and
  WHEREAS,  The  Kiwanis  Ice  Arena,  located  in  the Cantine Memorial
Complex, has served the interests of the people of the Empire  State  by
providing  the  Town of Saugerties with an Olympic size refrigerated ice
rink; and
  WHEREAS, The Kiwanis Ice Arena is an  ice  arena  that  operates  from
August  to  April,  offering  ice skating lessons, public skating, skate
rentals, hockey games with heated elevated spectator seating, and birth-
day parties; and
  WHEREAS, During its off season, the Kiwanis Ice Arena is  also  avail-
able  for off ice events, such as flea markets, fundraisers, parties and
camps; the building includes fully equipped locker rooms, a party  room,
an off ice training room, a full concession stand, and a pro shop; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is the custom of this Legislative Body that those organ-
izations which enhance the quality of life in their community  and  have
shown  a long and sustained commitment to the maintenance of high stand-
ards in  their  mission,  certainly  have  earned  the  recognition  and
applause of all the citizens of this great Empire State; now, therefore,
be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commemorate the 10th Anniversary of the Kiwanis Ice Arena on February 5,
2011; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Kiwanis Ice Arena, Saugerties, New York.
